snippet: Fourteen-time Grand Slam champion Rafael Nadal has begun legal proceedings against former French cabinet minister Roselyne Bachelot after she alleged that the Spaniard had failed a drug test....
lead_paragraph: Fourteen-time Grand Slam champion Rafael Nadal has begun legal proceedings against former French cabinet minister Roselyne Bachelot after she alleged that the Spaniard had failed a drug test.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Files Suit Against French Ex-Minister Over Drug Test Allegations
headline.main: Nadal Files Suit Against French Ex-Minister Over Drug Test Allegations
